Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and quality, it's truly a valuable asset. I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $150, reflecting its high value and the opportunity to own it before anyone else. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the unparalleled benefits it offers. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
